oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WHAT WE ARE DOING ABOUT SEISMIC SEA WAVES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Karo, H. Arnold
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: tsunamis
tsunami measurement
warning system
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: I am glad to have this opportunity to participate in this section of the Sixth Conference on Coastal Engineering. My remarks to the distinguished group of engineers and scientists assembled here today will emphasize a phase of the work of the Coast and Geodetic Survey of the United States Department of Commerce pertinent to one of the problems encountered in coastal engineering.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 6 (1957): Proceedings of 6th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Gainesville, Florida, 1957.; 9
